# Hi, neighbor! I'm Trey. :raising_hand_man: 
I am running for our neighborhood board because I'd like to help our community tackle some of our most pressing issues, including homelessness, traffic, and jobs. I'm also eager to hear about your hopes and concerns--you can always reach me at `trey@gogordner.com`. 

I believe that my experience as an advocate for affordable housing, urban planning researcher, and small business owner can help our community grow more sustainably and create more opportunity for our residents.
 
## :ballot_box: How to Vote
Voting begins **April 28** and ends **May 19**.  

In Neighborhood Board elections, **voting is online-only at this website**: [https://web1.hnl.info/nbe/starter](https://web1.hnl.info/nbe/starter). Registered voters will receive a passcode in the mail.  

For more information, visit the official [Election FAQs](https://www.honolulu.gov/cms-nco-menu/site-nco-sitearticles/18327-election-faqs.html).

[**Am I in Ewa 23? Check this Map.**](https://www.honolulu.gov/rep/site/nco/maps/23_Ewa.jpg)
